title: Public Relations Assistant
job_overview:
We are seeking a motivated and dynamic Public Relations Assistant to join our growing team. This is an exciting opportunity for individuals who are passionate about communications and eager to gain hands-on experience in the field of public relations. As a Public Relations Assistant, you will play a vital role in supporting our PR initiatives, enhancing our brand image, and communicating our message effectively to the public.

Key Responsibilities

Assist in drafting press releases, media kits, and other PR materials
Support the organization and execution of promotional events and campaigns
Maintain and update media contact lists and databases
Monitor media coverage and track PR metrics
Assist with social media content creation and engagement
Conduct research to support PR strategies and initiatives


Skills, Knowledge, and Expertise

Strong English written and verbal communication skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and social media platforms
Ability to work collaboratively in a team-oriented environment
Organizational skills with a strong attention to detail
A willingness to learn and grow with a new company
Prior experience in public relations or communications is a plus
Talent and entertainment experience are a plus


Benefits

Opportunities for career growth and development.
A dynamic and collaborative work environment.


About Lewis Line Public Relations:

Lewis Line Public Relations is a full-service PR agency based in Los Angeles. The firm specializes in elevating bold talent and transformative brands through culturally informed media strategies, compelling storytelling, and innovative campaigns. Lewis Line PR bridges traditional media savvy with next-generation creativity to deliver authentic, impactful results across entertainment, lifestyle, fashion, and social impact sectors.
